title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1810.2 - Payment limitations
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1810.2 - Payment limitations

State Regulations

Moving expense payments to displacees are limited
to: (a) Residential. Reasonable and
necessary moving expenses which exceed the limits provided under federal law or
regulation but not in excess of $300. (b) Commercial. Reasonable and necessary
moving expenses which exceed the limits provided under federal law or
regulation but not in excess of $25,000; provided, however, that such excess
moving expenses are not in any way otherwise reimbursed. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1810.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
